_metadata.notes: Auto-generated calculation snapshot - verify values match the game!

atomBonuses.bonusText: Every day you log in, the resource cost to upgrade a stamp's max lv decreases by 32% up to a max of 90%. This reduction resets back to 0% when upgrading any stamp max lv.
All talents that give more bonus per 'Power of 10 resources you own' will count +9 more powers of 10 than you actually own when giving the bonus.
No Bubble Left Behind bonus now has a 15% chance to level up the lowest bubble out of ALL bubbles, not just the first 15 of each colour. Also, +32% chance to give +1 additional Lv.
Every day, 1 silver pen from your Post Office will instantly convert into 1 PO Box for all characters. This conversion happens 224 times per day.
When a bubble has a cost of 100M or more to upgrade, you can instead spend particles. However, you can only do this 64 times a day, after which the cost will return to resources.
All wizard towers in construction get +64 max levels. Also, all wizards get a +2% damage bonus for each wizard tower level above 50 in construction. Total bonus: 830% wizard dmg.
Gold trimmed construction slots give +480% more build rate than before. Also, you now have 1 additional trimmed slot.
Increases the Checkout Refresh Speed of the Talent Library by +64%. Also, the Minimum Talent LV is increased by +32, and the Maximum Talent LV is increased by +10.
Increases your total damage by +32%. Also, reduces the cost of all atom upgrades by 32% too.
Stamp Doublers give an extra +0% MORE bonus than the normal +100% they give!

specialAtomBonuses.bonusText: Every day you log in, the resource cost to upgrade a stamp's max lv decreases by 32% up to a max of 90%. This reduction resets back to 0% when upgrading any stamp max lv.
All wizard towers in construction get +64 max levels. Also, all wizards get a +2% damage bonus for each wizard tower level above 50 in construction. Total bonus: 830% wizard dmg.
Increases the Checkout Refresh Speed of the Talent Library by +64%. Also, the Minimum Talent LV is increased by +32, and the Maximum Talent LV is increased by +10.

fluorideAtomBonus.bonusText: Multiplies your cooking speed by +32% for every meal at Lv 30+. In other words, every plate with a studded black void plate. Total bonus: 12B% cooking speed
